text: Arduíno Colasanti (15 February 1936 - 22 February 2014) was an Italian- Brazilian actor from Livorno, Tuscany. He appeared in over thirty movies between 1967 and 2010. Colasanti died from respiratory failure on 22 February 2014 in Niterói, Brazil. He was 78 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Tuscany Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:People from Livorno
title: Arduíno Colasanti
